property.caption: Options JSON
property.description: Options to be selected in the dropdown in the format [{"value": "string","label": "string","children": [{"value": "string","label": "string"}]}] for 2 layers. Multiple layers of children can be added. Options can be set to disable by adding a disabled boolean to the json. See documentation for more information.

property.caption: Can search
property.description: Whether or not the user can enter text to search the available options
